Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Sappaṭighaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Ārammaṇa
19.
1146Kusalaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1147Akusalaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1148Abyākataṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
20.
1149Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
